title: Hour 2 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and continue the conversation regarding fair-weather fans because Rich contends that if your team is getting crushed, then it’s ok to turn it off.  Covino shares why he is bummed for Yankee great Paul O’Neill.  Jimmy Garoppolo has been outed as being unresponsive to the 49ers back in 2018 during the offseason.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
